item.name: Spirit Root
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A root where an earth elemental resides.
If you plant this root onto a statue,
it will soon start moving as if it were alive.

item.name: Heart of the Foreign God
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
The heart of a savage demi-god.
A god is a god, even if it's a fake.
Its heartbeat emits many curses.

item.name: Crystallized Lore
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A highly pure crystal of magic created
when human history crosses a stream of Mana.
It can be said that it is the ingredient for materializing Heroic Spirits.

skills.name: Dreamlike Charisma A
skills.detail: Increase ATK (3 turns) & NP Gauge for all allies

skills.name: Illusion A
skills.detail: Apply Invincible (1 turn) & increase C. Star Drop Rate (1 turn) for all allies + decrease Critical Rate for all enemies (3 turns)

buffs.name: Invincible
buffs.detail: Ignore Sure Hit and reduce ATK damage to 0

skills.name: Hero Creation EX
skills.detail: Increase Buster Card effectiveness (3 turns) & Max HP (3 turns) & Critical Strength (1 turn) for one ally

classPassive.name: Territory Creation C
classPassive.detail: Slightly increase your Arts Card effectiveness

classPassive.name: Item Construction C
classPassive.detail: Slightly increase your Debuff Chance Rate

classPassive.name: Mixed Blood EX
classPassive.detail: Increase NP Gauge each turn for yourself

buffs.name: NP Gain Per Turn
buffs.detail: Gain NP at end of each turn

noblePhantasms.name: Garden of Avalon
noblePhantasms.detail: Restore HP each turn (5 turns) & Increase NP Gauge each turn (5 turns) for all allies + gain C. Stars each turn for yourself (5 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge>

buffs.name: HP Recovery Per Turn
buffs.detail: Recover HP at end of each turn

buffs.name: NP Gain Per Turn
buffs.detail: Gain NP at end of each turn

buffs.name: C. Star Gain Per Turn
buffs.detail: Gain C. Stars at end of each turn

comments.comment:
The vagabond of paradise. The court wizard, prophet, and adviser from the Legend of King Arthur. He would sometimes guide, sometimes cause trouble for, and sometimes aid King Arthur as he fought against his many enemies and overcame his many trials. He was a sage, but fundamentally not human. He was, in fact, a half-blood born of a human and an incubus.

"I love the world of humans, but as for individual humans, well, um... you know! Yep! Okay, I'm starting to think it's better left unsaid!"

As you can see, he's not particularly an ally of mankind.
He is one of the strongest Casters, but he isn't very good at magecraft. Why? Because he gets tongue-tied when chanting spells, you see.

Height/Weight: 178cm, 68kg
Origin: Legend of King Arthur, Other
Region: Western Europe
Alignment: Lawful-Good
Gender: Male
"You're asking why I don't cast spells?
Well, stabbing people is just faster!"

It's said that while his mother was the princess of Wales, his father was an incubus, a supernatural being that lives between the Earth and the Moon.
He was a prophet from a young age.

The prophecy that brought him the greatest fame was that of a red dragon and a white dragon that slept beneath Mt. Erir, and how they would fight after they awoke.

"The red dragon represents Britain, and the white dragon the Saxons. Someday, Britain will gather power under the banner of a great king, and defeat the Gauls and Romans."
These words were passed on through the ages as the prophecy of Merlin.
He left many other prophecies, some of which concerned even the outcome of wars and the deaths of kings.

Merlin aided Arthur's father, Uther Pendragon, in his marriage to the queen, watching over the throne since before King Arthur's birth.
In some versions of the story, he is like a foster father to Arthur, who watches over the young king's growth and teaches him many things.

『Garden of Avalon』
Rank: C Type: Anti-Personnel
Eternally Secluded Utopia.
Merlin recreates the tower where he is still sealed away.
Flowers bloom on the ground, and warm sunlight pours into the surroundings, even in the darkest depths of hell.
Even if he were trapped in the smallest and darkest of cells, his only view a fragment of the sky far above, his utopia would continue to manifest.

The place where Merlin, the Mage of Flowers, dwells will never be a hell.
It will be a land filled with hope.

Illusion: A
Magecraft that deceives others.
Refers to mental interference and false images projected into the real world.
At A rank, it can create not only nightmares within the world of the mind, but in the real world as well. It could easily create false images powerful enough to affect an entire village.

A young man like the wind blowing across a grassy plain.
Everyone relaxes in his presence.
A good-looking, easygoing man with a good heart.
But he lacks a sense of responsibility and tends to be relaxed no matter the situation, so he is often seen as a shady con man.
He takes an objective view of things, and while he admits that the human world can be a cruel place,
he says, "Well that's no fun, is it?" and changes the world into something happy.

He loves the world of mankind. He loves mischief. He loves girls.
The Mage of Flowers gets through most of his problems with a refreshing smile and a, "Now, now," retort.

He's often seen as a perfectly happy person, with no worries at all, but Merlin himself realizes that he is an outsider in human society, and so he can't tear down the final barrier of being able to call someone a dear friend.
He watches over the world day and night so that humanity can have a happy ending.

Hero Creation: EX
The skill to cause the birth of a king and raise them.
Merlin can be said to be King Arthur's true father, and is one of the most famous kingmakers in the world.

Mixed Blood: EX
Has the blood of a non-human within him. Merlin is part incubus, and has inherited its special traits.

Self-Manifestation: A
The ability to manifest in the world on one's own.
Merlin is not normally summoned as a Heroic Spirit. This is because there is no future where he can die.
He serves his Master as a Servant to vent his selfish desires, which could essentially be called a hobby.
In order to indulge this hobby of his, he single-handedly obtained this skill that only a certain special class could possess, and pretends to be summoned as a Servant.

comments.condMessage: Unlock after clearing Seventh Singularity and reach Bond Level 5
comments.comment:
He possesses outstanding clairvoyance, and was able to see both the collapse of the Round Table and Britain's peril. In spite of this, he left the country without telling King Arthur.

There are several theories as to why Merlin did not tell King Arthur of his fate, but it's said that this was because he did not side with any one individual, and instead only loved fate itself.

Afterwards, Merlin went to the utopia of Avalon, and sealed himself within the tower there.
Unable to die, he is destined to watch over the world of man until the end of time.
...Almost as if this were the lot of a foolish man who playfully interfered with the fate of a young girl.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
Happy birthday.
May it be a wonderful day, where good things become beautiful memories, and bad thing, a story to laugh about!

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hmm, I sense something going on. 
Could it be a visitor from a parallel universe? Why is there never any events where cute girls come to play?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Since we're free, let's go check it out. 
It's best to make use of our strength while we have it.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
The act of serving someone is natural to me.
After all, the human psyche is the source of my nutrition.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
You put your trust in me,
I will train you in return for that trust.
My policy is to watch over you rather than fight alongside you. 
My reward comes from the memories of this adventure.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What do I like? 
Humans, pranks, and women. 
That's because they're so much fun when I tease them.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
Things I hate...
I don't really have any, but if I had to say something, maybe Grand Casters? 
Obviously that includes me, but you know what I mean.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
As long as humans dream and strive to be better,
the Holy Grail will always exist.
That's not necessarily a bad thing. 
The problem begins when those dreams become too large for reality.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
I've been observing you from afar,
but now we will be allies fighting side by side.
I want you to know that you can count on me.
Especially if you want romantic advice!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Although I'm called the Mage of Flowers, that's just because I like flowers. 
I'm not sure how to feel about having flowers bloom as I walk, though.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Am I good or evil, you ask? 
That's for you to decide. 
I'm kind of like a fairy who only people connected to the future can see.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
The tough battles aren't going to stop.
But an easy battle is just a mundane task.
Just think of pain and struggle as precious in their own right.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Our journey has been quite a long one. 
I only joined you because I was a little curious, 
but you've become an important part of my life. 
My Lord. May flowers bloom wherever you wander.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Master, to pair Altria with me, are you a demon!? 
I mean, I'm actually happy, 
but I guess you can say I wasn't mentally prepared...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hmm... It's a future where Altria didn't draw the sacred sword...
I'm happy that she got to master Rhongomyniad. It's just... 
Like, vavoom! Her appearances changes that much when she matures!?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Master, I would like to talk to you...
It's been ages since I saw the king, but she glares at me like I'm a pig... Think she's just embarassed?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ha ha ha ha. 
Those knights never seem to learn.
How much trouble will they cause for Altria before they're satisfied? 
I say that, but it's so entertaining I can't look away.

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: Thank you. This isn't half bad.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 500800_0_G020]The path ahead of us is long. [id 500800_0_G021]Let's take our time.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 500800_0_G030]Ascension is an interesting system.
[id 500800_0_G031]It must have taken a lot of work.
[id 500800_0_G032]Allow me to repay you for the hardship.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 500800_0_G040]This is as far as my Spiritual Core can be strengthened. 
[id 500800_0_G041]You'd have to be quite the eccentric to go further, [id 500800_0_G042]but it doesn't look like that's going to stop you.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 500800_0_G050]Congratulations! 
[id 500800_0_G051]I didn't think you were so passionate. [id 500800_0_G052]I've never been happier to be wrong! 
[id 500800_0_G053]I'm going to live up to the title of "Grand Caster"...
[id 500800_0_G054]...Well, can't really promise that, [id 500800_0_G055]but I swear that I shall do whatever I can, Master.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text: People call me the Mage of Flowers.
voiceLines.subtitle:
Greetings, Master of Chaldea.
I am Merlin. People call me the Mage of Flowers.
Just call me Merlin. I don't care for formalities.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: It's a battle! Fighting isn't my specialty, but I'll give it a go!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Don't rush! Don't rush! I might mess up my spells.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Is it my turn? Ah, this one looks like a toughie!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I'll take care of them like it was a dream.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: This could use some adjusting.

voiceLines.name: Skill 3
voiceLines.subtitle: I trust you and your decision. Now, let's head out!

voiceLines.name: Skill 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Don't worry. Anything's possible if you're willing to try.

voiceLines.name: Skill 5
voiceLines.subtitle: I'll take care of them like it was a drea— (Foou!) Ack!?

voiceLines.name: Skill 6
voiceLines.subtitle: This could use some adjus— (Foou!) Ack!?

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes?

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Very well.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Your wish is my command.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Let us talk about the king.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: There's a small window here.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Huh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: How about that?

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Take this!

voiceLines.name: Attack 4
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm much better at this!

voiceLines.name: Attack 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Oh, it's nothing... I'm doing this for you!

voiceLines.name: Attack 6
voiceLines.subtitle: Fu...ha!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: It's just not my style...!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: It's time to get serious!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: You're such a savage...!

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Unh!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm withdrawing. I leave the rest to you.

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm sorry for being so useless!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Well done. On to the next one.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: My body aches. It's been a while since I've fought...

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 500800_0_B800]Under the sky that is the beginning of all things, [delay 3]there are no walls, no castles, no nations.
[id 500800_0_B801]The Primordial Planet dazzles from the bottom of the earth.
[id 500800_0_B802]I'll show you the domain of the soul...Garden of Avalon!
